docs.lead_paragraph: A strategy with a political benefit: It allows the administration to keep working with even the most recalcitrant states.

headline.main: States Will Be Given Extra Time to Set Up Health Insurance Exchanges
headline.print_headline: States Will Be Given Extra Time to Set Up Health Insurance Exchanges

docs.abstract: White House says it will give states more time to comply with new health care law after finding that many states lag in setting up markets where millions of Americans are expected to buy subsidized private health insurance.
docs.snippet: A strategy with a political benefit: It allows the administration to keep working with even the most recalcitrant states.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

docs.lead_paragraph: Readers react to findings that Americans are less healthy and die earlier than citizens of most other advanced countries.

headline.main: The Troubling State of Americans’ Health
headline.print_headline: The Troubling State of Americans’ Health

docs.snippet: Readers react to findings that Americans are less healthy and die earlier than citizens of most other advanced countries.

docs.lead_paragraph: With each side claiming popular support, President Obama and Congress’s Republican leaders dug in on their positions.

headline.seo: Obama and G.O.P. Set Debt Limit Showdown
headline.main: Obama and G.O.P. Issue Challenges on the Debt Limit
headline.print_headline: Obama and G.O.P. Issue Challenges for Their Conflicting Views on the Debt Limit

docs.abstract: Pres Obama and Congress's Republican leaders hold strong to their conflicting positions about raising the nation's debt limit, indicating that president's second term will open with a potentially perilous budget showdown.
docs.snippet: With each side claiming popular support, President Obama and Congress’s Republican leaders dug in on their positions.
